modName: Beyond Skyrim - Bruma Spirits in Skyrim
summary: Adds the beverages and food items added in Beyond Skyrim - Bruma to the inns in the areas that have the most imperial influence including Falkreath, Riverwood, and Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00ff00][size=5]Beyond Skyrim - Bruma Spirits in Skyrim[/size][/color]
[/center][size=3]
[b][u]Description:
[/u][/b]
This mod adds the Bruma inn leveled list items to specific inns in Skyrim, so you can drink your favorite Cyrodiilic Spirits in Skyrim! Adds brand new food items found in Beyond Skyrim Bruma to the inns located in Falkreath, Riverwood, and Solitude (the most heavily influenced by the empire). 

[u]Future Plans:[/u]
[list]
[*][size=3]Add Bruma merchant items to merchants in Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=3]Add Bruma inn items to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun[/size]
[/list][/size]
author: Xarxee
